original_text: Also, we can trust God to help us when we turn to him. We know that he will hear us. When we ask for anything that he wants us to have, he listens to us.
korean_text: 그를 향하여 우리가 가진 바 담대함이 이것이니 그의 뜻대로 무엇을 구하면 들으심이라

sentences.original_text: Also, we can trust God to help us
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 우리는 하나님이 우리를 도와주실 것을 믿을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We know that he will hear us.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 우리를 들으실 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: that he wants us to have,
